Be Curious and experience a cocktail session with Pierre Boyer, Martell Brand Ambassador
If you've yet to try Martell's NCF cognac, this is a great time to start. Unlike other cognacs, NCF (Non-Chill Filtered) is filtered at room temperature, resulting in an exceptionally smooth-tasting and aromatic cognac.
Join brand ambassador Pierre Boyer in a Be Curious Martell NCF mentoring session, where you'll make 3 NCF cocktails while sampling delicious finger food - limited spots available.
8pm Tuesday 20 February 2018 at The China Bar KL
Reserve your seat <[[https://winetalk.com.my/martell-nfc-cognac-cocktail-session-with-pierre-boyer-at-china-bar-tue-20th-feb-2018.html/?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=martell_edm]]>
Martell Be Curious Chinese New Year Dinner
Be Curious. Be Delighted. Be Indulged. Such was the atmosphere for the last 3 months as Martell lovers enjoyed a delightful chinese dinner in celebration of the upcoming Chinese New Year - view pictures here <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/photos/?tab=album&album_id=1686007081469206]]>.
The Martell Be Curious Dinner Series will continue to run until 23 March 2018 where you can participate in the "Spend and Win" contest, with fabulous prizes such as a Mercedes Benz E200 Avantgarde and more. Check your inbox soon for details on the next event!
Don't forget to purchase Martell festive gift sets and limited-edition bottles while stocks are available.
